entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
